Package model

Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
model.Weapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Purchasable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Axe, BaseballBat, Chainsaw, Dagger, Fists, FryingPan, GolfClub, Katana, Mace, Machete, Nunchucks, Pickaxe, Pitchfork, Scythe, Shield, Shovel, Shuriken, Sledgehammer, Spear, Sword, TennisRacket
public abstract class Weapon extends Object implements Purchasable, Cloneable
Class Weapon contains all the general properties and functionality a weapon should have. A weapon is normally used in the context of being assigned to a champion.

  • Constructor Details

    • Weapon

      public Weapon(String name, float damageMultiplier, int offenseBoost, int defenseBoost, float price, float priceChangeWeekly, boolean isDefaultWeapon)
      Creates a new Weapon object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the weapon
      damageMultiplier - the amount that damage dealt is multiplied by
      offenseBoost - the amount of offense boost the weapon provides
      defenseBoost - the amount of defense boost the weapon provides
      price - the base price of the weapon
      priceChangeWeekly - the weekly price change of the weapon
      isDefaultWeapon - true if this is the default weapon

    • buy

      public void buy(Team team) throws InsufficientFundsException, FullTeamException
      Buy the weapon by adding it to the given team and deducting the weapon price.
      Specified by:
      buy in interface Purchasable
      Parameters:
      team - the team that wants to buy the weapon
      Throws:
      InsufficientFundsException - if the team cannot afford this weapon
      FullTeamException - if the team weapon list is already full

    • sell

      public void sell(Team team)
      Sell the weapon by removing it from the given team and refunding the weapon price.
      Specified by:
      sell in interface Purchasable
      Parameters:
      team - the team that contains this weapon
